--- select_count_asterisk.sql
select count(*) from singers

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Results: []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.CountStarExpr{
          Count: 7,
          Rparen: 14,
        },
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From: 16,
      Source: &ast.TableName{
        Table: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 21,
          NameEnd: 28,
          Name: "singers",
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM singers
